an5.154:1.1: “Pancime, bhikkhave, dhamma saddhammassa sammosaya antaradhanaya samvattanti.
an5.154:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na sakkaccam dhammam sunanti, na sakkaccam dhammam pariyapunanti, na sakkaccam dhammam dharenti, na sakkaccam dhatanam dhammanam attham upaparikkhanti, na sakkaccam atthamannaya dhammamannaya dhammanudhammam patipajjanti.
an5.154:1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, panca dhamma saddhammassa sammosaya antaradhanaya samvattanti.
an5.154:2.1: Pancime, bhikkhave, dhamma saddhammassa thitiya asammosaya anantaradhanaya samvattanti.
an5.154:2.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sakkaccam dhammam sunanti, sakkaccam dhammam pariyapunanti, sakkaccam dhammam dharenti, sakkaccam dhatanam dhammanam attham upaparikkhanti, sakkaccam atthamannaya dhammamannaya dhammanudhammam patipajjanti.
an5.154:2.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, panca dhamma saddhammassa thitiya asammosaya anantaradhanaya samvattanti”ti.
